message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.NE

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - This paper is primarily focused on text-to-speech (TTS) synthesis, which falls under the domain of natural language processing (NLP) and speech processing, both of which are sub-areas of cs.CL.
2. cs.SD (Sound) - The paper deals with speech synthesis, which is a sub-area of sound processing. 
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper proposes a new TTS system based on deep convolutional neural networks, which can be considered a control system for speech synthesis. 
4. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper uses deep learning techniques, specifically convolutional neural networks, for TTS synthesis, which falls under the domain of machine learning. 
5. cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) - The paper proposes a neural TTS system based on deep convolutional neural networks, which falls under the domain of neural computing.
